title: A nice, clean and quiet hotel close to l'Arc de Triomphe and the Congress Centre
text:
I stayed at this hotel as I decided to choose it because of its proximity to the Congress centre, which was the venue of the congress I attended and also because of the excellent price I could get for the quality. It is a friendly, clean and quiet hotel with a good location for both attending the congress centre as well as to visit the sights in Paris as it is a throw away from the Arc de Triomphe and Champs d'Elysees.
Gladly recommend this hotel to friends and colleagues.
